title: Novelty Search
content: Science and Technology Novelty Search Workstation In 2004, Nankai University Library was certified by the Ministry of Education as a Sci-tech Novelty Retrieval Workstation . The Library provides inside and outside researchers of NKU with high-quality, high-standard science and technology novelty retrieval and project consulting services through its rich electronic information resources, traditional information resources, human resources, and geographical advantages.
